name: IndependenceFacts
0:
”Alexa open fire works”
”Alexa, ask fire works for an independence fact”
”Alexa tell fire works to tell me an independence fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fire works
des:
Ask for Independence day facts.

Independence Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Independence Facts" or "Alexa, open Independence Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
